name: Temportal Potions
description:
A short almost 1-bit puzzle game about potions and portals. 

Made for the Brackeys Game Jame 2020.2 with a theme of 'Rewind'

At time of submission, I was only able to get 2 of 5 potion types implemented. More to come!

Best played with a keyboard.

Designed and built in ~30 hours of work over 1 week by one person.
